Source code for steps_when

from pytest_bdd import when, parsers
from pytest_selenium_enhancer import CustomWait
from selenium.webdriver import ActionChains
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from selenium.webdriver.support.select import Select

from utils.locators import Locators



[docs]@when(parsers.re("I set the locale for locators to '(?P<locale>.*)'"))
@when(parsers.re("I set the language for locators to '(?P<locale>.*)'"))
def set_locale(locators: Locators, locale):
    """
    Setting up the locale for an element using the locators

    :param locale: locale_name
    :return: None
    """
    locators.set_locale(locale)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I click on '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def click_element(selenium, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Performing an click operation on an element

    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path)).click()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I double click on '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
@when(parsers.re("I doubleclick on '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def dbl_click_element(selenium, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Performing a double click on an element

    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    ActionChains(selenium).double_click(element).perform()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I programmatic click on '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def js_click_element(selenium, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Performing a click on an element using java script

    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    selenium.execute_script('arguments[0].click();', element)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I add text '(?P<text>.*)' to field '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def add_element_value(selenium, text, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Performing a text append in an element

    :param text: text_to_append
    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    actual_text = element.get_attribute('value')
    element.send_keys(actual_text + text)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I set text '(?P<text>.*)' to field '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def set_element_value(selenium, text, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Performing a text insert in an element

    :param text: text_to_insert
    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    element.send_keys(text)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I clear text from field '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def set_add_element_value(selenium, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Clearing the text from an input text field

    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    element.clear()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I drag and drop element '(?P<source>.*)' to element '(?P<target>.*)'"))
def drag_and_drop_element(selenium, locators: Locators, source, target):
    """
    Performing a drag and drop of an element using source and target value

    :param source: source_of_the_element
    :param target: target_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    source_elem = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(source))
    target_elem = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(target))

    action = ActionChains(selenium)
    action.drag_and_drop(source_elem, target_elem).perform()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I pause for '(?P<time>.*)' s"))
def pause_execution(selenium, time):
    """
    Performing a custom wait for give seconds

    :param time: seconds_to_wait
    :return: None
    """
    CustomWait(selenium).static_wait(int(time))




[docs]@when("I fetch existing cookies from the site")
def fetch_cookies(selenium):
    """
    Fetching the existing cookies from the site

    :return: None
    """
    selenium.get_cookies()



@when(parsers.re("I update the value of newly added cookie '(?P<name>.*)' with '(?P<value>.*)' for path '(?P<path>.*)'"))
@when(parsers.re("I set the cookie '(?P<name>.*)' with value '(?P<value>.*)' for path '(?P<path>.*)'"))
def check_cookie_content(selenium, name, value, path='/'):
    """
    Updating the newly added cookie value to given value

    :param name: name_of_cookie
    :param value: value_to_update
    :param path: path_of_cookie
    :return: None
    """
    selenium.add_cookie({"name": name, "value": value, "path": path})



[docs]@when(parsers.re("I delete the cookie '(?P<name>.*)'"))
def check_cookie_content(selenium, name):
    """
    Deleting a cookie

    :param name: name_of_the_cookie
    :return: None
    """
    selenium.delete_cookie(name)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I press '(?P<key>.*)'"))
def press_button(selenium, key):
    """
    Performing a key press

    :param key: key_to_press
    :return: None
    """
    ActionChains(selenium).send_keys(key).perform()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I accept popup prompt"))
@when(parsers.re("I accept popup alertbox"))
@when(parsers.re("I accept popup confirmbox"))
def accept_modal(selenium):
    """
    Accepting the prompt/alertbox/confirmbox popup

    :return: None
    """
    selenium.switch_to().alert().accept()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I dismiss popup prompt"))
@when(parsers.re("I dismiss popup alertbox"))
@when(parsers.re("I dismiss popup confirmbox"))
def dismiss_modal(selenium):
    """
    Dismissing the prompt/alertbox/confirmbox popup

    :return: None
    """
    selenium.switch_to().alert().dismiss()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I enter (?P<text>.*) into popup alertbox"))
@when(parsers.re("I enter (?P<text>.*) into popup confirmbox"))
@when(parsers.re("I enter (?P<text>.*) into popup prompt"))
def check_modal(selenium, text):
    """
    Entering the given text into an alertbox/confirmbox/prompt popup

    :param text: text_to_enter
    :return: None
    """
    selenium.switch_to().alert().send_keys(text)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I scroll to element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def scroll_to_element(selenium, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Performing a scroll to an element

    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    script = 'arguments[0].scrollIntoView({block: "center", inline: "center"})'
    selenium.execute_script(script, element)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I close the last opened window"))
@when(parsers.re("I close the last opened tab"))
def close_last_opened_window(selenium):
    """
    Closing the latest window

    :return: None
    """
    windows = selenium.window_handles
    selenium.switch_to_window(windows[-1])
    selenium.close()




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I focus the last opened window"))
@when(parsers.re("I focus the last opened tab"))
def switch_to_last(selenium):
    """
    Focusing on the latest window

    :return: None
    """
    windows = selenium.window_handles
    selenium.switch_to_window(windows[-1])




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I select the option at index '(?P<index>.*)' element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"),
      converters=dict(index=int))
def select_option_by_index(selenium, index: int, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Selecting an option from a dropdown using the index

    :param index: index_to_select
    :param locator_path: locator_of_element
    :return: None
    """
    select = Select(selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path)))
    select.select_by_index(index)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I select the option '(?P<option>.*)' by value for element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def select_option_by_value(selenium, option, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Selecting an option from a dropdown using the value

    :param option: value_to_select
    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    select = Select(selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path)))
    select.select_by_value(option)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I select the option '(?P<option>.*)' by visible text for element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def select_option_by_visible_text(selenium, option, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Selecting an option from a dropdown using the visible text

    :param option: text_to_select
    :param locator_path: locator_of_element
    :return: None
    """
    select = Select(selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path)))
    select.select_by_visible_text(option)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I deselect the option at index '(?P<index>.*)' element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"),
      converters=dict(index=int))
def deselect_option_index(selenium, index: int, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Deselecting the option from a dropdown using the index

    :param index: index_to_deselect
    :param locator_path: locator_path
    :return: None
    """
    select = Select(selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path)))
    select.deselect_by_index(index)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I deselect the option '(?P<option>.*)' by value for element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def deselect_option_by_value(selenium, option, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Deselecting the option from a dropdown using the value

    :param option: value_to_deselect
    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    select = Select(selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path)))
    select.deselect_by_value(option)




[docs]@when(parsers.re("I deselect the option '(?P<option>.*)' by visible text for element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def deselect_option_by_visible_text(selenium, option, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Deselecting the option from a dropdown using the visible text

    :param option: text_to_deselect
    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    select = Select(selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path)))
    select.deselect_by_visible_text(option)



@when(parsers.re("I move to element '(?P<locator_path>.*)' with offset '(?P<x>.*)' '(?P<y>.*)'"))
def move_to_element_by_offset(selenium, locators: Locators, locator_path, x, y):
    """
    Moving the mouse cursor to the element using given x, y co-ordinates

    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :param x: x_co-ordinates
    :param y: y_co-ordinates
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    ActionChains(selenium).move_to_element_with_offset(element, int(x), int(y))



[docs]@when(parsers.re("I move to element '(?P<locator_path>.*)'"))
def move_to_element_by_offset(selenium, locators: Locators, locator_path):
    """
    Moving the mouse cursor to the element

    :param locator_path: locator_of_the_element
    :return: None
    """
    element = selenium.find_element(By.XPATH, locators.parse_and_get(locator_path))
    ActionChains(selenium).move_to_element(element)
